page.title: 03My Village Birlingham
page.content: Birlingham is a quiet place. There are fields with cabbages, potatoes, cauliflower and wheat. There are about two hundred and fifty people living in Birlingham. There is a cricket pitch . The pub is called The Swan. In the village there are four farms. Visitors come to the village to fish in the river , mostly they go on barges and pleasure cruisers. Sometimes people come walking around the village to see what's in the fields and to look at the hill. There's a lock and a weir at Nafford. I like living in the village because there's plenty of stuff to do. I like going to Neil Griffin's farm. I milk the cows with Neil and I feed the cows.
